mapper.insert: insert into t_file (id, file_name, file_path, sfile_path, file_size, pid, module_type, create_date) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{moduleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_file set file_name = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_path = #{filePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sfile_path = #{sfilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_size = #{fileSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, module_type = #{moduleType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, file_name, file_path, sfile_path, file_size, pid, module_type, create_date from t_file

select count(1) from t_file where 1=1
and pid = #{pid}
